myelin.torch.functional.lif¶

Types¶

LIFParameters¶

class myelin.torch.functional.lif.LIFParameters¶

Parametrization of a LIF neuron

Parameters

  • tau_syn_inv (torch.Tensor) – inverse synaptic time constant

  • tau_mem_inv (torch.Tensor) – inverse membrane time constant

  • v_leak (torch.Tensor) – leak potential

  • v_th (torch.Tensor) – threshhold potential

  • v_reset (torch.Tensor) – reset potential

  • method (str) – method to determine the spike threshold (relevant for surrogate gradients)

  • alpha (float) – hyper parameter to use in surrogate gradient computation

LIFState¶

class myelin.torch.functional.lif.LIFState¶

State of a LIF neuron

Parameters

  • z (torch.Tensor) – recurrent spikes

  • v (torch.Tensor) – membrane potential

  • i (torch.Tensor) – synaptic input current

LIFFeedForwardState¶

class myelin.torch.functional.lif.LIFFeedForwardState¶

State of a feed forward LIF neuron

Parameters

  • v (torch.Tensor) – membrane potential

  • i (torch.Tensor) – synaptic input current

Integration Functions¶

lif_step¶

myelin.torch.functional.lif.lif_step(input, s, input_weights, recurrent_weights, p=LIFParameters(tau_syn_inv=tensor(200.), tau_mem_inv=tensor(100.), v_leak=tensor(0.), v_th=tensor(1.), v_reset=tensor(0.), method='super', alpha=0.0), dt=0.001)¶

Computes a single euler-integration step for a lif neuron-model.

Parameters

  • input (Tensor) – the input spikes at the current time step

  • s (LIFState) – current state of the LIF neuron

  • input_weights (Tensor) – synaptic weights for incoming spikes

  • recurrent_weights (Tensor) – synaptic weights for recurrent spikes

  • p (LIFParameters) – parameters of a leaky integrate and fire neuron

  • dt (float) – Integration timestep to use

Return type

Tuple[Tensor, LIFState]

lif_feed_forward_step¶

myelin.torch.functional.lif.lif_feed_forward_step(input, s, p=LIFParameters(tau_syn_inv=tensor(200.), tau_mem_inv=tensor(100.), v_leak=tensor(0.), v_th=tensor(1.), v_reset=tensor(0.), method='super', alpha=0.0), dt=0.001)¶

Computes a single euler-integration step for a lif neuron-model. It takes as input the input current as generated by an arbitrary torch module or function.

Parameters

  • input (Tensor) – the input spikes at the current time step

  • s (LIFState) – current state of the LIF neuron

  • p (LIFParameters) – parameters of a leaky integrate and fire neuron

  • dt (float) – Integration timestep to use

Return type

Tuple[Tensor, LIFFeedForwardState]
